description: Local database identifier of the catalog.
Name of the catalog with the language tag.
Description of the catalog with the language tag.
An entity responsible for making the resource available.
The language(s) used in the catalog.
The reference to the usage license of the catalog.

A knowledge organization system (KOS) used to classify the cataloged resources that are part of this catalog. It is recommended that the taxonomy is organized in a skos:ConceptScheme, skos:Collection, owl:Ontology or similar.

The relation between the catalog and its items. This is the most general predicate for membership of a catalog. It is recommended to use more specific sub-properties such as dcat:dataset, dcat:catalog, dcat:service, or a custom sub-property.
A property-value pair, e.g. representing a feature of a product or place.
